name: Arkwright House
description:
Arkwright House – A Minigame of Horror

You are twelve-year old Lily. While playing at dusk, your little brother runs into Arkwright House, an old abandoned orphanage.

You have heard the stories... 

Find your brother and bring him back home. But beware: If you get too scared, you may go insane and get trapped in Arkwright House forever...

Arkwright House is a Mini Horror Text-Adventure by Miles Matrix, creator of the XYZZY Finalist American Angst and Synthwave producer from Vienna, and was initally part of the Steam edition of American Angst. Find out more on his website.

Follow Miles Matrix on Twitter and listen to his music.
